en
conf te
ip route 172.31.0.0 255.255.255.0 172.31.1.193
ip route 172.31.1.196 255.255.255.252 172.31.1.193
ip route 172.31.1.128 255.255.255.192 172.31.1.193

==

conf te

conf te
